text: Thus says Yahweh to his anointed one,
to Cyrus, whose right hand I have grasped
to subjugate nations before him,
and I uncover\f + \fr 45:1 \ft Or “let loose” \f* \add the\add* loins of kings
to open doors before him,
and \add the\add* gates shall not be shut:
“I myself will go before you,
and I will level \add the\add* ⸤mountains⸥.\f + \fr 45:2 \ft Literally “swells” \f*
I will break \add the\add* doors of bronze
and cut through\add the\add* bars of iron.
And I will give you \add the\add* treasures of darkness
and treasures of secret places
so that you may know that I \add am\add* Yahweh,
the one who calls \add you\add* by your name, the God of Israel,
for the sake of my servant Jacob,
and Israel my chosen one.
And I call you by your name;
I give you a name of honor, though\f + \fr 45:4 \ft Or “and” \f* you do not know me.
I \add am\add* Yahweh, and there is none besides \add me\add*;
besides me there is no god.
I gird you though\f + \fr 45:5 \ft Or “and” \f* you do not know me,
so that they may know from \add the\add* rising of \add the\add* sun
and from \add the\add* west that \add there is\add* none besides me;
I \add am\add* Yahweh and there is none besides \add me\add*.
\add I\add* form light and \add I\add* create darkness;
\add I\add* make peace and \add I\add* create evil;
I \add am\add* Yahweh; \add I\add* do all these \add things\add*.
Trickle, O heavens, from above,
and let clouds trickle \add with\add* righteousness;
let \add the\add* earth open so that\f + \fr 45:8 \ft Or “and” \f* salvation may be fruitful,
and let it cause righteousness to sprout along with it.\f + \fr 45:8 \ft Or “together” \f*
I myself, Yahweh, have created it.
Woe \add to the\add* one who strives with his ⸤maker⸥,\f + \fr 45:9 \ft Literally “one who forms” \f*
a potsherd among\f + \fr 45:9 \ft Or “with” \f* potsherds of earth!
Does \add the\add* clay say to the one who fashions it,
‘What are you making?’
and ‘Your work has no hands’?
Woe \add to the\add* one who says to a father, ‘What you are begetting?’
or\f + \fr 45:10 \ft Or “and” \f* to a woman, ‘\add With\add* what are you in labor?’ ”
Thus says Yahweh, the holy one of Israel,
and its ⸤maker⸥:\f + \fr 45:11 \ft Literally “one who forms” \f*
“Ask me of the things to come ⸤about⸥\f + \fr 45:11 \ft Literally “over” \f* my children,
and you command me about the work of my hands.
I myself made \add the\add* earth,
and I created humankind upon it.
I, my hands, stretched out \add the\add* heavens,
and I commanded all their host.
I myself have stirred him up in righteousness,
and I will make all his paths smooth.
He himself shall build my city,
and he shall set my exiles free,
not for price or a gift,” says Yahweh of hosts.
Yahweh the Only Savior
Thus says Yahweh:
“The acquisition of Egypt
and the merchandise of Cush
and the Sabeans, tall men,
shall pass over to you;
they shall be yours,
and they shall walk behind you.
They shall pass over in chains,
and they shall bow down to you;
they will pray to you:
‘Surely God \add is\add* with you, and there is no \add other\add*.
Besides \add him\add* \add there is\add* no God.’ ”
Surely you \add are\add* a God who keeps yourself hidden,
God of Israel, \add the\add* savior.
All of them are ashamed and indeed humiliated;
\add the\add* craftsmen of idols go together in insult.
Israel is saved by Yahweh \add with\add* everlasting salvation;
you shall not be ashamed,
and you shall not be humiliated ⸤to all eternity⸥.\f + \fr 45:17 \ft Literally “for eternity, forever” \f*
For thus says Yahweh, ⸤who created⸥\f + \fr 45:18 \ft Literally “creating” \f* the heavens,
he \add is\add* God, ⸤who formed⸥\f + \fr 45:18 \ft Literally “forming” \f* the earth
and ⸤who made⸥\f + \fr 45:18 \ft Literally “making” \f* it.
He himself established it;
he did not create it \add as\add* emptiness—
he formed it for inhabiting.
“I \add am\add* Yahweh and there is none besides \add me\add*.
I have spoken not in secrecy, in a place, a land, of darkness,
I have not said to the descendants of Jacob, ‘Seek me ⸤in vain⸥!’\f + \fr 45:19 \ft Literally “in emptiness,” as in verse \xt 18 \ft \f*
I, Yahweh, \add am\add* speaking righteousness,
declaring uprightness.
Assemble and come;
draw near together, survivors of the nations!
They do not know, those who carry ⸤their wooden idols⸥\f + \fr 45:20 \ft Literally “the wood of their idol” \f*
and pray to a god who cannot save.
Declare and present \add your case\add*,
also let them consult together!
Who ⸤made this known⸥\f + \fr 45:21 \ft Literally “caused to hear this” \f* from ⸤former times⸥,\f + \fr 45:21 \ft Literally “before” \f*
declared it from ⸤of old⸥?\f + \fr 45:21 \ft Literally “then” \f*
\add Was it\add* not I, Yahweh?
And there is no \add other\add* god besides \add me\add*,
a righteous God besides me,
and no savior besides me.
Turn to me and be saved, all \add the\add* ends of \add the\add* earth,
for I \add am\add* God and there is none besides \add me\add*.
I have sworn by myself;
a word that\f + \fr 45:23 \ft Or “and” \f* shall not return has gone forth from my mouth \add in\add* righteousness:
‘Every knee shall kneel down to me;
every tongue shall swear.’
‘Only in Yahweh,’ one shall say to me, ‘\add are\add* righteousness and strength.’
He shall come to him, and all those who were angry with him shall be ashamed.
In Yahweh all the offspring of Israel shall be in the right,
and they shall boast.”
